message: Hello Bob, thank you for considering my product! I'm excited to discuss the details with you. After careful consideration, I'm willing to offer you the product for $900000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $750000. I believe this is a more reasonable price considering the market value of similar products.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but I'm not willing to go as low as $750000. After re-evaluating the product's value, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $850000. I believe this is a fair compromise considering the product's unique features and benefits.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above the budget I had in mind. I'm willing to pay $775000 for the product. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to my business.
